title: Dear RITO
body:
On behalf of the League of Legends community I am writing today to beg for you to stop releasing champions with "Dash/Flash" mechanics.


Sincerely,


The people that put up with your creative inspirations.

replies.body:
Why? It adds an element of skill to their kit. 

Take Gragas. His E+Flash takes a bit of skill. And while his E-Flash if VERY strong, remember he can only use it once every 5 minutes, which balances it out. 

Eve has E-Flash and Flash-Ult combos. Zoe can Flash while Ulting for extra distance. Riven has all sorts of Flash mechanics. Alistar has a Flash combo too.
You realise you don't have to "Put up with it", right? Nothing stopping you quitting the game :)
